mapper.insert: insert into gpost(groupnum, gposttitle, userid, gpostcontents) values(#{groupnum},#{gposttitle},#{userid},#{gpostcontents})
mapper.select: select count(*) from gpost where groupnum = #{groupnum}
select count(*) from gpost where groupnum = #{groupnum} and gpostcontents like "%${keyword}%"
select * from gpost where groupnum = #{groupnum} order by gpostnum desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select * from gpost where groupnum = #{groupnum} and userid = #{userid} order by gpostnum desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
select max(gpostnum) from gpost where userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update `gpost` set gprcnt = gprcnt+1 where gpostnum=#{gpostnum}
update `gpost` set gpostlike = gpostlike+1 where gpostnum=#{gpostnum}
update `gpost` set gpostlike = gpostlike-1 where gpostnum=#{gpostnum}
update `gpost` set gpostcontents = #{gpostcontents}, gpostregdate = now() where gpostnum=#{gpostnum}
mapper.select: select * from `gpost` where groupnum=#{groupnum} and gpostgongji=1;
SELECT * FROM gpost WHERE groupnum=#{groupnum} and gpostlike = (SELECT MAX(gpostlike) FROM gpost) order by gpostnum desc;
